Text:
just realized i quoted (and linked to) a previous appearance of Vidal at the 92Y from 2006 with the  same interviewer. there seems not to be a page on the 92Y website for the interview in the video on offer.

a very entertaining talk, as one would expect. Vidal's impersonations floor me, still

there are four full essays on this site starting with this one:
http://www.gorevidalpages.com/2001/09/gore-vidal-september-11-end-of-liberty.html
